movie.title: Along With the Gods: The Last 49 Days
movie.title_english: Along With the Gods: The Last 49 Days
movie.title_long: Along With the Gods: The Last 49 Days (2018)
movie.description_intro: In the afterlife, one guardian helps a man through his trials, while his two colleagues help a former guardian on earth.
movie.description_full: In the afterlife, one guardian helps a man through his trials, while his two colleagues help a former guardian on earth.

movies.title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
movies.title_english: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
movies.title_long: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995)
movies.summary: Six years after Michael Myers' last massacre in Haddonfield, Jamie Lloyd has a child, but is then killed by Michael. Michael is allied with the Cult of Thorn, who both protect him and gave him the Curse of Thorn, the reason he killed all of his family. The Strode Family also moved into the Myers' house and are stalked by Michael. Sam Loomis and Tommy Doyle, a boy Laurie babysat during Michael's first rampage, are now out to stop Michael and the cult. Michael heads to kill Jamie's son and the rest of Laurie's family, but Dr. Loomis and Tommy plan to stop the curse, defeat the cult, stop Michael, and put an end to his murderous rampages, once and for all.

movies.title: Girl's Revenge
movies.summary: Bullying. Humiliation. An ugly truth. She's standing up for her friend. But her retaliatory quest is about to unravel. After a sex video subjects her friend to mockery and bullying, a transfer student sets out to reveal the truth as campus secrets come to light.
movies.description_full: Bullying. Humiliation. An ugly truth. She's standing up for her friend. But her retaliatory quest is about to unravel. After a sex video subjects her friend to mockery and bullying, a transfer student sets out to reveal the truth as campus secrets come to light.

movies.title: Amer
movies.summary: Three key moments, all of them sensual, define Ana's life. Her carnal search sways between reality and colored fantasies becoming more and more oppressive. A black laced hand prevents her from screaming. The wind lifts her dress and caresses her thighs. A razor blade brushes her skin, where will this chaotic and carnivorous journey leave her?

movies.title: My Boss, My Hero
movies.summary: When a young gang leader seems to be just a bit too stupid to effectively carry out his daily tasks--embarrassing his gang members and himself frequently--his superiors order him to go back to school for his high school diploma. Once situated in the school, posing as a 19-year-old, he soon learns that the school is even more corrupt and vicious a place to spend his days than in his gang. After he can't stand it any longer, he decides to stop playing "the innocent student" and unleashes his wrath on the place.
